entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
